attributes.action: refrain from signing long term EU rule/amendment changes during his final weeks in office which affect the UK prior to the New PM taking office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During Mr Blair's final weeks as PM, he should refrain from signing long term commitments on EU constitutional Changes or EU membership rules prior to the New PM taking office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
